#summary Download page
=Baical v0.5.2=
[http://baical.googlecode.com/files/Baical_v0.5.2.zip Download] latest version.
Changes list:
 * Added: P7.Trace viewer. Live scrolling
 * Fixed: P7.Telemetry storage. Lazy storage initialization fails
 * Fixed: P7.Telemetry viewer. Memory leaks
 * Fixed: P7.Telemetry viewer. Scrolling on release was wrong for real-time streams
You may have to install in addition [http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=5555 Visual C++ 2010 Redistributable]
=P7 Library v1.7.2=
[http://code.google.com/p/baical/source/checkout Checkout] latest source code:
Changes list:
 * Added: processing multiple extra packets encapsulated in single ack packet
 * Fixed: compilation warnings generated by GCC with -Wall option

=Angara v0.9.8=
[http://baical.googlecode.com/files/Angara_v0.9.8.zip Download]  latest version.
Changes list:
 * Added: Send internal logs to Baical server
 * Fixed: TMF parsing error
